name: Yamilé Bueters

description: The nature as a machine. Eroding man made materials with natural processes.

description: Break the rule of our familiar situation by using surprise elements.

name: Rachel Borovska
description: A monument for a landscape of morality. Morality is defined as a method of organising things within and around us. In my project I try to walk the audience through the phases of creation and organissation by going back to the very first beginning.

name: Kornelija Chaleckytė
description: The Wall, a project that physically researches numerous appearances and passing-through routines of crafted walls.

name: Aref Dashti
description: It is equally fatal for the mind to have a system and to have none. It will simply have to decide to combine the two.

description: 10 bridges to nowhere

description: Are you a true traveller?

name: Ashton Kang
description: What is it of being intuitive.

description: Use an algae farm as design tool, to recreate a continuous loop.

description: An oasis for both the nomads and inhabitants.

description: Using the elements that inhabitants use in standerized social housing projects, to create a space that will exclude the individual from the collective.

description: The culture of Ambon tells its story by vizualizing a pattern. Whether the reinterpretation of marquetry deriving from Art Deco emphasizes its value.

description: Headroom, a project that focuses on the fictional spatial experience – approaching and walking through seductive and, at the same time, suppressed volumes.
